title: @riot oce teambuilder vs draft pick
body:
Riot over a year ago you removed my favroute que in the entire game from just this one server Draft pick

Now you got teambuilder yea cool but i have never actually been able to get a game in with it unless i do something like a 5 man premade which defeats the entire purpose anyway. It also doensn't have bans and you can't see the enemy picks anyway so what is the damn point anyway.

But anyway you removed draft pick in the argument that the ques where too long. Yet this was said in the time where URF was active and half the community was playing that. So realistically the data was pretty damn flawed as it was. That is like saying Oh people aren't going to doughnut king any more when there is a krispy kreme next door that is only going to be open for 2 weeks. Then expect for the business of that doughnut king to stay exactly the same. Obviously that is going to have a negative impact on the numbers. Now i am queuing in team builder to prove a point i will probably hit 20 minutes before i even get into a game. I NEVER waited more than 5 minutes for draft pick. Maybe some people with diamond mmr actually had troubles but the majority of the community was fine with the ques and still qued anyway so there isn't a problem.

replies.body:
Easy answer, **remove blind pick and replace with TB and draft. 
**
TB for people who want to play the role they want every time.
Draft for those that want structure and bans. 
Easy.
i agree with you but riot avoids any topic that makes them look slightly bad

I spent 17 minutes queing to get into a game

20 mins to form team 

3 mins to wait in  que until someone abandoned

so there we have it 40 mins to que for not even getting into a game now i don't think teambuilder is working i NEVER had to wait more than 3 minuites at prime time to play lol for draft pick 

teambuilder is liteally 10x worse que time than draft pick yet you justified that draft pick was removed because of que times yet you wont remove teambuilder when it's que times are far more severe.
